sentences.sContent: Most of the passes have been closed with the onset of winter.
sentences.sCn: 随着冬天的来临，大多数的关卡都已经关闭。

synos.tran: 开始，着手；发作；攻击，进攻

remMethod.val: 来自词组set on 攻击； 使开始

trans.tranCn: 攻击， 进攻； 开始
trans.tranOther: Theonsetof something is the beginning of it, used especially to refer to something unpleasant
